name: The Bleeding (heavybro)
description:
The Bleeding

The Bleeding - is the game where you just run and shoot at enemies and you have to reach goal from A to B, currently there are 15 levels and the game is based on atmosphere, darkness and so on.

Key Features
  • Gore, lots of gore and pleasant sounds of gibing flesh!
  • The darkness that surrounds you.
  • Eliminate cultists and maniacs by using 7 kinds of weapon! From the pitchfork to aerosol can!
  • Secrets and optional objectives which you get rewarded with new arm!
How do I play?

The rules are simple, you play as the character who is similar to Caleb from the 1997 game called Blood. And you have stats such as the armor, hit points, ammo and the inventory. Your goal is to reach the end of the level, but keep in mind that you have to start over when you die so be careful!
